title: Auto Q auto, % health true damage... how hasn't this been removed?
body:
{{champion:267}} {{item:3107}}

This combo needs to be nerfed right into the trash can so we never have to deal with this zero-counterplay nonsense ever again.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Jimmy Rustles,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ccfhEajz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-06-17T21:07:58.470+0000)
>
> What?

You were expecting {{champion:67}} {{item:3124}} but it wasn't. :3

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ccfhEajz,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-06-17T21:21:50.270+0000)
>
> You were expecting {{champion:67}} {{item:3124}} but it wasn't. :3

Ya pulled a sneaky on me
Somehow I expected {{champion:223}} because I forgot his w is magic cabbage XD... Well played Sir

> [{quoted}](name=PermaJinxed,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ccfhEajz,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-06-17T22:40:25.698+0000)

If he had full Conqueror stacks, he would be dealing some % health true damage with W. Technically.
